defs: = ಅರಾಷ್ಟ್ರಕತೆ.
a male ruler of a nation or state usually called a kingdom; a male sovereign, limited or absolute; a monarch; a king.
a respectable, elderly man.
an unpleasant feeling caused by impending defeat, danger, pain, disgrace, loss, etc.; fear.
(dial.) the total of what one remembers; remembrance; memory; recollection.
= ಅರಾಸ2.
= ಅರಾಲ2.
an elephant in rut.
a class of elephants (classified on their physical size and strength).

(dance) a gesture of both hands, in which the forefinger curved like a bow, the thumb also curved and the others kept one behind the other, while all the fingers of the other hand are bent but the ring finger and the little finger are raised a little, but not straightened.
to remove or divide into parts with a sharp-edged instrument; to cut off; to sever.
to mow or reap with a scythe, sickle, etc.
ಅರಿದುಹೋಗು aridu hōgu to be, become or get, severed.
to know; to learn; to understand; to have a clear perception; to be aware of; to get knowledge of or skill in by study, experience, instruction.
to come to know.

ಅರಿಯೆ ಎನ್ನುವುದನ್ನು ಆನೆ ಕೊಟ್ಟು ಕಲಿ ariye ennuvudannu āne koṭṭu kali (prov.) it is better to say 'I do not now' rather than inviting problems by volunteering to be a public witness; 2. the more you acquire knowledge, the more you must be humble; ಅರಿಯದೆ ಮಾಡಿದ ಪಾಪ ಅರಿತಂದು ಪರಿಹಾರ ariyade māḍida pāpa aritandu parihāra (prov.) realisation of one's sin expiates him from it.
to cleanse (grains) in water.
the crop (of paddy, rāgi, etc.) reaped, not threshed, but left on the field in handful quantities.
that much handful of reaped crop taken at a time, for threshing.
a disease of the eye, with an extra growth inside the eye-lid.
one that is antagonistic to another, esp. one seeking to injure, harm, overthrow; a foe; an enemy.
a symbol for the number six.
(astrol.) (in the horoscope) sixth house from the birth place.
a circular weapon with sharp blades, a disc.
(dial.) to flow or let flow, in drops or driblets; to trickle; to dribble; to leak.
he who can defeat his enemies.
he that can subdue his enemies.
the military force of an enemy.
to bundle the reaped crop, for threshing.
Śiva, who destroyed his enemy Manmatha.
a title 'one who chops of his enemies'.
a solemn, earnest supplication or request to a superior or deity or to a person or group in authority; prayer or entreaty; a petition.
great fame; reputation; celebrity; renown.
to get or earn, fame; to become renown.
a leader of fame; a famous hero.
(dial.) a small bundle of grass, firewood, etc. which can be carried in one's arms.
a title 'one who causes intense fear among his enemies'.
a long thin stick used while thrashing the corns.
a knot that is difficult to untie; a complex knot.
a tangle; difficulty.
an eye afflicted with the disease characterised by an extra growth inside the eye-lid.
a particular stone which is used in treating the eye disease, characterised by an extra grown inside the eye-lid.
= ಅರಿಕಟಕ.
a title 'a champion destroyer of the armies of enemies'.
= ಅರಿಟಾಳ.
the tree Sapindus emarginates of Sapindaceae family; the soapnut tree.
its nut.
the twenty second spiritual teacher of Jainas.
a decorated pot worshipped in marriages.
a worshipping of such a pot.
the act of cutting in to pieces; a cutting off; incision.
a cutting or being cut; a cut.
a small, open vessel or watercraft propelled by oars; a boat.
a long pole with a broad blade at one end, used to row a boat; an oar.
= ಅರಿದಾಳ.
an emblem having a picture of a severed human head.
a title 'one who causes intense fear among his enemies'.
= ಅರಿದಾಳ.
arsenic trisulfide, As2S3, having a lemon-yellow colour and a resinous lustre which is used as a pigment; orpiment.
that is not possible; that cannot be achieved or understood; impossible.
not having a similar in the past; being without a precedent; unparalleled; unprecedented.
that which is impossible to achieve or to understand.
a long staff with a sickle hooked at one end.
a title 'one who faces enemies boldly'.
the military force of an enemy.
he who slays his enemies.
(gram.) a heterogeneous compound (esp. a compound of a Kannaḍa word and a Samskřta word, which has no literary sanction, (popularly known as ari samāsa).
a formal agreement made with an enemy relating to peace as per the terms of which valuable fertile lands are given to the latter.
a seat of honour.
to communicate knowledge to, to tell (of, about); to disclose facts about someone; to make another know.
a hedge plant, Lantana camara, of verbenaceae family; yellow lantana.
the military force of an enemy.
= ಅರಿಬಲ.
a conqueror of enemy force.
an excellent title.
a man with an excellent title.
a soldier in the enemy force.
he who is a terror to his enemies.
the way or manner in which one deals with his enemies.
a member of a Zoroastrian religious sect in India descended from a group of Persian refugees who fled from the Muslim persecutions of the 7th and 8th centuries; a Parsee.
the Persian country (now known as Iran, South West Asia).
a small tree. Solanum verbascifolium.
to think about; to determine, resolve, work out, etc. by reasoning.
to ignore or disregard; to neglect.
= ಅರಿವು.
a variety of Catechu tree of Mimosae family.
one who cannot be conquered, overpowered or challenged; an invincible man.
the sun or the Sun God.
the family or race claimed to be the descendant of the Sun God.
to cause to cut, pierce or incise.
to cause to understand; to help one know; to inform.
to be cut; to be incised.
a king who is hostile.
the military force of an enemy.

any of the luminous celestial objects seen as points of light in the sky; esp., any self-luminous, celestial body having continuous nuclear reactions which send heat, light, etc. in all directions; a star.
a thick mixture of clay, and sometimes sand, with water; wet soft earth; slime.
the plant Citrus maxima of Rutaceae family.
a variety of fish.
the sky, as the path for the movement of stars.
the military force of an enemy.
a multitude of enemies.
a set of six vices (they being lust, anger, avarice, infatuation, arrogance and jealousy) considered as the enemies.
a drug, gas, etc. used to produce anaesthesia, as before surgery; an anaesthetic.
the act of causing loss of sensation by an anesthetic, hypnosis or acupuncture and limited to a specific area or involving a loss of consciousness.
a man who has specialised in administrating medicine to a patient for causing loss of sensation by an anesthetic in a specific area or for the loss of consciousness.
a woman who has specialised in administrating medicine to a patient for causing loss of sensation by an anesthetic in a specific area or for the loss of consciousness.
= ಅರಿವಡೆ.
a cutting tool consisting of a crescent-shaped blade with a short handle: used for cutting down tall grasses and weeds; a sickle.
the act of knowing.
all that has been perceived or grasped by the mind; learning; enlightenment.
one not having knowledge, in general or in a particular field of knowledge; an ignorant, stupid person.
want of knowledge or normal intelligence; the quality or condition of being stupid; stupidity.
(Masc.) one who slays his enemies.
(astrol.) Rāhu considered as the eighth of the nine planets that affect the life of individual persons.
he who obliterates his enemies.
knowledge - a) acquaintance with facts; range of information, awareness or understanding; b) all that has been perceived or grasped by the mind; learning; enlightenment.
conscious feeling or sense impression; sensation.
the state of being conscious; awareness of one's own feelings, what is happening around one, etc.; consciousness.
the power or process of receiving conscious sense impressions through direct stimulation of the bodily organism; sensation; the act of perceiving; perception.
one who lacks normal intelligence or knowledge; a person lacking in judgement or prudence; a fool.
to impart knowledge; to make known; to teach.
to lose temporarily one's consciousness; to become unconscious.
to lose one's ability of responding consciously to the out side fact or stimuli.
to be stunned, bewildered.
a woven or knitted fabric of fibrous material, as cotton, wool, silk, hair, synthetic fibres, etc.; a cloth.
a piece of such fabric for a specific use (as dhōti).
(dupl.) (gen.) a cloth.
a police man (who, as a part of his uniform, used to strap his leg below the knee with a narrow band of thick cloth).
(dial.) a weak leg.
a decorated pot worshipped in marriages.
a worshipping of such a pot.
= ಅರಿಸಿನ.
the tree, Bauhinia variegata (var. candida) of Caescelpiniaceae family; white ebony.
a degenerative disease in an organ of the body, esp. the liver, marked by excess formation of connective tissue and, usually, subsequent painful swelling; cirrhosis.
= ಅರಿಷಡ್ವರ್ಗ.
a set of six vices (as lust, anger, avarice, fondness (infatuation), arrogance and jealousy) considered as the enemies within.
a man who is not subject to the six vices ಅರಿಷಡ್ವರ್ಗ (see above).
absence of difficulty, impediment.
good fortune; favourable situation.
bad or ill luck; an extreme misfortune bringing loss, sorrow; a calamity.
a portentous phenomenon foreboding misfortune; an unlucky omen.
a symptom of approaching death.
the largest crow (Corvus corax), with a sharp beak, found in Asia; a raven.
the liquid left after churning butter from milk; buttermilk.
the tree Azardirachta indica of Meliaceae family, whose trunk exudes a tenacious gum and has a bitter bark used for medicinal purpose; neem.
the tree Sapindus emarginates of Sapindaceae family; the soapnut tree.
its nuts.
a bulbous herb (Allium sativum) of the lily family and its stong smelling bulb used as a seasoning in meats, salads, etc.; garlic.
a hostile person; an enemy.
a lying-in-chamber; a delivery-room; a room for confinement in childbirth.
(masc.) a person having tendency to commit crimes; an evil or wicked person; scoundrel.
(Jan.) a class of demi-gods.
(Jain.) a kind of precious gem.
an extract produced by decocting; a decoction, sometimes added with sugar, honey, jaggery etc. for medicinal purposes.
a spirituous liquor.
name of a hell.
a room for confinement in childbirth; a lying-in-chamber.
that which or he who brings loss, calamity, danger or bad luck.
a destroyer of scoundrels.
preventing, having the tendency to prevent, misfortune from happening.
(myth.) brother of Garuḍa, the king of birds.
(Jain.) name of the twenty second spiritual teacher.
Lord Ganēśa, the lord (and remover) of obstacles.
a worship, religious ritual, to prevent misfortune.
= ಅರಿಷ್ಟಗೃಹ.
(astrol.) an inauspicious moment.
name of a hell.
an inauspicious woman who brings bad luck.
(gram.) a heterogeneous compound (esp. a compound of a Kannaḍa word and a Samskřta word, which has no literary sanction.
= ಅರಿಸಿನ.
turmeric - a) the plant Curcuma longa of the Zingiberaceae family; b) its root stock and the yellow powder made from it.
hot water mixed with turmeric powder.
the yellow colour.
a yellow cloth, esp. a long, unstitched one, used by women, the one end as a skirt the other a cover to the breast and shoulder; a sari.
ಅರಿಸಿನದ ಕೊನೆ arisnada kone = ಅರಿಸಿನ ಕೊಂಬು; ಅರಿಸಿನದ ಮೈ arisinada mai a person who has just married (so said, as it is customary to smear the body of such a person with turmeric powder).
the rootstock of the plant Curcuma longa.
a part of religious functions in a house, where women (whose husbands are alive) are invited and turmeric and vermilion powders are distributed as a mark of propitiousness.
ಅರಿಸಿನಕುಂಕುಮದ ಭಾಗ್ಯ arisina kuŋkumada bhāgya the woman's fortune of having her husband alive during her life period, considered auspicious;
the prickly composite plant, Argemone mexicana of Papaveraceae family; yellow thistle.
the tree, Bauhinia variegata (var. candida) of Caescelpiniaceae family; white ebony.
= ಅರಿಸಿನ ಉಮ್ಮತ್ತಿ.

a condition due to obstruction of the bile or absorption of the colouring matter into the blood, characterised by yellowness of the skin, diarrhoea and general debility; the disease causing this condition; jaundice.
= ಅರಿಸಿನಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
(dial.) a small branch of a fig tree worshipped with turmeric, dry and ripe coconut, etc. on the occasion of marriages.
the plant Garcenia indica ( = G. purpurea) of Guttiferae family; kokum.
the small, evergreen tree Garcinia morella of Guttiferae family, that yields gum resin which is used as a yellow pigment and as a cathartic; the true gamboge tree.
= ಅರಿಸಿನಗುರುಗ.
= ಅರಿಸಿನಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
the plant Sesbania sesban (S. aegyptiaca) of Papilionaceae family; common sesban.
the tree Adina cardifolia of Rubiaceae family; yellow-oak.
= ಅರಿಸಿನ ಉಮ್ಮತ್ತಿ.
an ornamental tropical tree Cochlospermum religiosum ( = C. gossypium) of Cochlospermaceae family, a tropical ornamental tree.
= ಅರಿಸಿನಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
= ಅರಿಸಿನಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
the plant Plycorpeae aurea of Caryophyllaceae family.
= ಅರಿಸಿನಗುರುಗ.
the plant Allamanda Cathartica of Apocynaceae family.
a rite of anointing the bride and the groom oil and turmeric powder before marriage.
to cause to cut, pierce or incise.
to remove seeds from (cotton) with a gin; to gin.
a painful swelling of a vein in the region of the anus, often with bleeding; haemorrhoids; piles.
the act of cutting in to pieces; a cutting off; incision.
a cutting or being cut; a cut.
= ಅರಿಹಂತ.
any of the twenty four Jaina spiritual teachers.
one who reaps the crop; a reaper.
a reaped, but not thrashed, crop.
to have a longing for; to want; to desire; to crave; to wish.
the tropical hot red pepper plant, Capsicum annuum of Solanaceae family, common chilli.
its pod;(?).
a sore, usu. infected spot on the body, as an ulcer, boil or blister.
a critical or indispensable part (of the body).
(Jain.) an order of ascetics.
causing pain; infecting wounds.
cutting or sarcastic in speaking; making biting remarks; bitter and caustic in temper, manner or speech; acrimonious.
he who is acrimonious.
(myth.) name of sage Vasiśṭha's wife, renowned for her chastity.
(fig.) a chaste woman.
one of several visible stars in most conspicuous north constellation Ursa Major (between Lynx and Draco constellations).
the maxim of viewing ಅರುಂಧತಿ star used to point out to a minute or precise object or subject, by referring to an obvious or gross object or subject.
that which is difficult to achieve or to understand.
an unexpanded flower; a flower-bud.
a bamboo stick.
(obs.) a tax levied on farmers depending on the number of ploughs they had.
a kind of insect.
= ಅರುಗುಮಾಡು.
to go aside; to give way to another.
an outer edge; a border; a margin; a fringe.
a position or space beside one; a side.
ಅರುಗಾಗು arugāgu to go aside; to give way to another.
to keep aside; to take away from one's path.
to cause to go; to send.
lack of taste; tastelessness.
want of appetite.
dislike; disrelish.
a sickening distaste or dislike; deep aversion; repugnance; disgust.
lack of brightness; dullness.
absence of interest.
a healthy man; a man free from diseases.
= ಅರುಟಾಳ.
the tree Sapindus emarginatus of Sapindaceae tree; soapnut tree.
its nut.
= ಅರುಟಾಳ.
= ಅರುಟಾಳ.
the colour of the dawn or morning twilight.
the reddish brown, tawny or red colour.
(myth.) name of the charioteer of the Sun God.
the sun.
a ray of light.
a variety in leprosy characterised by red spots and insensibility.
the tree Calophyllum inophyllum of Guttifereae family.
name of a mountain, situated to the west of Kailāsa mountain in the Himalayan belt.
a light, fine, stringlike length of material made up of two or more fibers or strands of spun cotton, flax, silk, etc. twisted together and used in sewing; a thread.
a river rising in Goṇḍavana and joining the river Gangā near Pāṭna in north India (also called Śoṇa).
powdery earth or other matter in bits fine enough to be easily suspended in air; dust.
gold.
a kind of little poisonous creature.
the red metal, copper.
one of the Upaniṣats, the sacred scriptures of Hindūs.
(Jain.) a class among the demigods.
the red lotus - plant Nymphaea pubescens of Nymphaeceae family.
flower.
one whose eyes resemble the red-lotus flower.
Křṣṇa, who has lotus-like beautiful eyes.
the colour of the morning twilight.
the red liquid that circulates through the heart, arteries and veins of vertebrates; the blood.
a down pour of blood.
to pour oneself with the blood (as in a battlefield).
= ಅರುಣಜಲ.
the quality or state of being red; redness.
= ಅರುಣಕಮಲ.
the sun looking red, as either while rising or setting.
the tree Feronia limonia ( = F. elephantum) of Rutaceae family; elephant apple; wood apple.
the plant Plecospermum spinosum of Moraceae family.
a variety in cardamom plant.
its capsule of seeds or a seed; black cardamom.
a red cloth.
= ಅರುಣಜಲ.
a variety in paddy.
the Sun-God, who has Aruṇa as his charioteer.
the big red ant.
= ಅರುಣಜಲ.
a woman whose eyes have turned red (either in anger or from intoxication).
the red lip (esp. of a woman).
a woman with red lips.
= ಅರುಣಕಮಲ.
(myth.) Brahmini kite personified as Garuḍa, brother of Aruṇa.
a clear, deep-red variety of corundum, valued as a precious stone; the ruby.
a defence wall; a wall as a protection.
being red; dyed red; reddened; empurpled.
the red colour.
(the morning light) to begin to grow.
to cause to rise; to raise; to make appear in public.
being red; turned red.
the medicinal plant Aconitum heterophyllum of Ranunculaceae family.
the substance obtained from this plant, for medicinal purpose.
the creeper Rubia cordifolia, of Rubiaceae family.
the plant Citrullus colocynthis of Cucurbitaceae family.
the plant Abrus precatorius of Papilionaceae family; crab's eye; wild liquorice.
the break of the day.
appearance of subdued light just before sunrise.
= ಅರುಣಾಶ್ಮ.
= ಅರುಣಾಶ್ಮ.
a period of six months; a half-year duration.
the feeling of surprise, admiration, and awe aroused by something strange, unexpected, incredible, etc.; a wonder.
six times hundred.
the cardinal number between fifty-nine and sixty-one; six hundred.
to communicate knowledge to, to tell (of or about); to disclose facts about someone or something; to make another know.
to offer for acceptance; to tender.
to dedicate; to address or inscribe (a book, an act etc.) to someone as a mark of honour or affection.
to symbolically offer food, flowers, etc. to a deity.
condition, quality, fact or instance of being responsible; obligation, accountability, dependability, etc.; responsibility; dutifulness.
a prolonged period of dry weather; lack of rain; serious shortage of water; drought.
= ಅರುವೆ.
any valuable thing.
dupl. of ಅರುಮಾಸಿ.
fond or tender feeling; warm liking; affection.
a light, quick, jerky movement; the quality or state of being infirm, unsteady; unsteadiness.
the quality or fact of being fond of play or fun; lack of seriousness.
being six times more than a given quantity or number.
the quantity or number which six times more than another quantity or number.
(obs.) a tax levied on farmers depending on the number of ploughs they had.
totalling to sixty.
the cardinal number sixty; 60.
the pledging of property to a creditor as security for the payment of a debt; mortgage.
the act of observing; attention; regard; heed; cognisance; notice.
all that has been perceived or grasped by the mind; learning; enlightenment; knowledge.
the power or process of receiving conscious sense impressions through direct stimulation of the bodily organism; sensation.
a woven, knitted or pressed fabric of fibrous material, as cotton, wool, silk, hair, synthetic fibres, etc.; a cloth.
causing or inflicting wounds or pain.
the tree Semecarpus anacardium of Anacardiaceae family.
its nut; marking nut.
a painful swelling of a vein in the region of the anus, often with bleeding; haemorrhoids; piles.
having enough power, skill, etc. to do something; able.
fit to be chosen; legally or morally qualified; eligible.
= ಅರುಹಂತ.
a man having required power, skill, etc. to do something; an able man.
a man fit to be chosen on the basis of his qualification, eligibility.
a Jaina spiritual teacher, chiefly any of the twenty four such persons regarded.
a Jaina temple.
to give knowledge of something to; to tell; to inform; to teach; to make known; to reveal.
all that has been perceived or grasped by the mind; learning; enlightenment; knowledge.
a feeling of grief or tenderness aroused by the sufferings or distress of others, compassion; sympathy for otheṛs sorrows; pity.
a song in praise of Lorḍs compassion or sympathy.
a compassionate person.
a flower or a floret.
a variety in fish.
feeble and childish state due to old age; senility; dotage.
to show compassion; to sympathise.
dupl. of ಅರುಳು2.
to extend sympathy; to be compassionate.
the fact or state of being or becoming unused; the condition of not being used or practiced any more; disuse; desuetude.
having no shape or form; formless; shapeless.
to reduce to powder or fine particles by crushing and friction; to grind; to powder; to pulverise.
to crush or squeeze (as a sugar cane, leaves, to get juice out); to work up (flour, clay etc.) into a plastic mass (dough) by pressing and folding it with the hands; to knead.
to be reduced to powder.
to be distorted; to lose one's original form or shape.
to cause to study laboriously; to teach thoroughly.

ಅರೆದುಕುಡಿ aredukuḍi to learn or study thoroughly; ಅರೆದುಕುಡಿಸು aredukuḍisu to teach thoroughly; ಅರೆದುಹೊಯ(ಯ್ಯಿ) areduhoy(yyi) to teach thoroughly; ಅರೆದವ ಕುಡಿದಾನು aredava kuḍidānu (prov.) as you brew, so you must drink.
a large mass of stone.
an open excavation for building stone, slate etc.; any source of building stone; a quarry;

ಅರೆ ಆಳು are āḷu half the turnover or quantum of work a normal person can do in a day; ಅರೆ ಉಣಿಸು are uṇisu insufficient food; ಅರೆಮಾಡು aremāḍu to make incomplete; to stop a job without completing; ಅರೆಯಾಗು areyāgu to become deficient; to be incomplete.
either of two equal parts into which a thing or quantity is or may be divided; a half.
that which is not a whole (not necessarily being half).
a few things (uncertain ones).
a falling short; deficit, insufficiency; deficiency.
a recess or hollow in a wall, as for a statue, bust or vase; a niche.
a space within a building enclosed by walls or separated from other similar spaces by walls or partitions; a room.
a sliding box in a table, bureau, chest, etc., that can be drawn out and then pushed back into place; a drawer.
a kind of percussion instrument, used in folk-dance.
want of digestive power; inability to digest food.
any one of the rods connecting the hub with the rim of a wheel; a spoke.
somewhere; at some place.
sometime; at some unspecified time.
a few; not many; in small, limited or restricted number.
ಅರೆಬರ್ arebar (pl.) a few people.
half - a) being either of the two equal parts; b) being about a half of the amount, length, etc.
incomplete; fragmentary; partial.
an interjection expressing wonder or objection.
to be missed; to be lost.
a sand bank.
the plant Grislea tomentosa.
(pl.) some places.
(pl.) a few persons.
(pl.) some places.
to stop on the way; to bring to halt.
to offer opposition, physically or verbally.
a slightly or half opened door.
a huge rock.
he that abandons an undertaking before completing it; a non-accomplisher; one who lacks correct knowledge for accomplishing a work.
an old coin; half of a kāṇi.
a former cultivating the land on lease, for which half the produce is to be given as lease-rent to the land owner.
= ಅರೆಕಾಲು.
eighth part.
eighth part of a seer; arepāvu.
an old coin; half a kāsu.
a negligible amount or value.
ರಾವಣನ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆಗೆ ಅರೆಕಾಸಿನ ಮಜ್ಜಿಗೆ Rāvaṇana hoṭṭege arekāsina majjige (prov.) too little for a huge need; a glutton is not satisfied with spoonful of food.
the reddish colour, but not dark.
want of something to be a whole; incompleteness; deficiency.
any insufficient quantity of food.
the lines on the thumb at the joint of two digits.
a loose knot.
a knot of hair on the back, below the nape.
to lose slightly one's natural colour; to wither slightly.
to bite with teeth, but lightly.
a half-done or incomplete work.
to tie loosely; to bind in a loose manner.
to cut into two halves.
to get severed; to become two.
to churn, but incompletely.
the act of becoming reduced in size, number or extent; a reducing or being reduced.
= ಅರೆಗಣ್ಣು.
half-opened eye.
blindness over half the field of vision; hemianopsia.
the state of the eye being opened half.
to half close the eye.
a slightly or half opened door.
black in colour, but not jet black; greyish black; ash colour.
to half-burn; to parch slightly.
(half the portion) to get charred.
to get burnt incompletely.
= ಅರೆಗಲ್ಲು.
a stone on which something (esp. spices) is ground; a grinding stone.
a hard stone used to sharpen cutting tools; hone; a whetstone.
a large mass of stone.
an open excavation for building stone, slate etc.; any source of building stone; a quarry.
a short mail-coat or garment, usu. without sleeves or collar, extending from the neck to the waist.
half-the value of a cowrie (formerly used as money).
a period of time equal to half the gaḷige; a duration of 12 minutes.
a very short period of time.
